DOC.brief_summary: The study will examine which dose of SVT-40776 is best in terms of efficacy, safety and tolerability compared to placebo and tolterodine
DOC.brief_title: SVT-40776 in Patients Suffering From Overactive Bladder Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from OAB for at least 6 months prior to inclusion Pregnant and breastfeeding women Any medical condition or need for comedication which interferes with the drug under investigation (SVT40776) or the comparator (tolterodine)
